{{Exclusive|console|customtext=This feature is exclusive to ''[[Xbox 360 Edition]]'' and ''[[Xbox One Edition]]''.}}{{Infobox skin pack
| skins = 45
| price = {{price|2.99}}
| release = March 13, 2013
}}[[File:Skin Pack 4 key art.jpg|thumb|Key art]]

'''Skin Pack 4''' is a [[skin pack]] that includes 45 skins referencing various characters from ''[[Minecraft]]'' and other popular video games. It is exclusive to the {{editions|xb360|xbone}} of ''[[Minecraft]]''.
